```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
data <- read_csv("data/joint_regional_categorical - Sheet1.csv")

exchange_rates <- c(
  "2025" = 0.8642,
  "2024" = 0.9610,
  "2023" = 0.9061,
  "2022" = 0.9343,
  "2021" = 0.8833,
  "2020" = 0.8131
)

clean_data <- data %>%
  mutate(
    millions_of_euros = ifelse(
      unit == "millions of euros",
      revenue,                                  # keep unchanged
      revenue * exchange_rates[as.character(year)]  # convert dollars â†’ euros
    )
  )

write.csv(clean_data, "data/region_category_clean_data.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```
